content.prompt: The artists who created the wall frescoes in the House of the Vettii included which of the following visual effects?

choices.label: Illusionistic architectural features and vistas to create a sense of spatial depth
Scenic paintings framed with embossed gold leaf to incorporate contrast
Multiple thick layers of paint to emphasize luscious surface textures
Modeled forms that follow the natural contours of the stone surface to create drama

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
